caption.p:
Effect of pre-treatment with flumazenil (FLU, 3 mg/kg, i.p.) and WAY-100635 (WAY, 1 mg/kg, i.p.) on the effect of the essential oil of P. nigrum (PNEO 10 mg/kg, p.o.) in the tail suspension test (TST). Data are represented as mean ± SEM (n = 6) and the values obtained by using One-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett's test, where. ∗∗ p < 0.01 compared with the control group
##
p < 0.01 compared with the PNEO (10 mg/kg p.o.) treated group.
